titles.title: Providing for consideration of certain joint resolutions making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2001, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-998, by Mr. Linder.

Upon the adoption of the resolution, it shall be in order to consider House Joint Resolutions 115 through 120, as they are needed. Each resolution shall be debated for one hour, and one motion to recommit, in each case, will be in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 317.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 646.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 205 - 191 (Roll no. 551).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/24/2000--Introduced. Sets forth rules (separate closed) for the consideration of H.J. 115, H.J. 116, H.J. 117, H.J. 118, H.J. 119, and H.J. 120 (continuing FY 2001 appropriations).
